title: Walking Together: Building Relationships with Indigenous Peoples with Mark Buchanan
description:
"If you come because your freedom is bound up with our freedom, then let's walk together." I speak with Mark Buchanan, a former pastor now professor at Ambrose University on how he forged relationships with the indigenous people living nearby. We speak about the history of Native peoples in Canada and why the relationship has been uneasy for many years. We also speak about how to move forward

Podcast version here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/Walking-Together-Building-Relationships-with-Indigenous-Peoples-with-Mark-Buchanan-eak60v

Follow me on twitter @AndreaLynnLewis
Email me here: andreawiththebangs@gmail.com
